snippet: At a Paris service for two Radio France Internationale journalists abducted and killed in Mali over the weekend, Malian officials seemed to be asking for France’s continued support.
abstract: Diplomats, journalists and humanitarian workers gather in Paris to mourn brutal killing of two seasoned French journalists by insurgents in Mali, episode that has raised questions about France’s plans to withdraw some of its troops from country.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: At a Paris service for two Radio France Internationale journalists abducted and killed in Mali over the weekend, Malian officials seemed to be asking for France’s continued support.

headline.main: Killing of French Journalists Reverberates in France and Mali
